query:
WITH 3 as active_days
MATCH p = (u:User)-[e:HasUserProfile]-(c:Computer)
WHERE e.profileModified > (datetime().epochseconds - (active_days * 86400))
RETURN p
name: Profilehound - Active User Profile within last 3 days
description: Checks for all user profiles with a modified time within the last 3 days
